name: Line Generator
description: Streams a file line by line.

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: Optionally specify on which nodes to run and how many instances you want on each node.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of node handler, one of SingleNode, SomeNodes, AllNodes (leave empty for local execution)

parameters.name: nodes
parameters.description: The nodes to use for this node handler type

parameters.name: instances
parameters.description: The amount of instances per node of this handler type

parameters.name: start_line
parameters.description: The start line to start streaming from.

parameters.name: end_line
parameters.description: The end line to stop streaming on, inclusively. Streamed until end of file if omitted.

parameters.name: batched
parameters.description: Will DataPackets contain 'batch size' datums each, or will 'batch size' datums be read from the file, but then pushed in separate DataPackets.

parameters.name: batch_size
parameters.description: While lines are processed one by one, the buffered reader takes them in batches. Tweak for best performance.

parameters.name: backoff_interval
parameters.description: After reading this many batches, we backoff for a while to make sure we don't flood the flow.

parameters.name: backoff_amount
parameters.description: This is the amount of milliseconds to backoff for.
